snippet: The New York City Ballet’s spring gala offered premieres by Peter Martins and Benjamin Millepied, and a return of Balanchine’s “Symphony in C.”
abstract: Alastair Macaulay reviews New York City Ballet's spring gala, featuring premieres of dance works by Benjamin Millepied and Peter Martins at the David H Koch Theater.
lead_paragraph: The New York City Ballet’s spring gala offered premieres by Peter Martins and Benjamin Millepied, and a return of Balanchine’s “Symphony in C.”

headline.seo: New York City Ballet Premieres by Martins and Millepied
headline.main: Pretty Works That Are New, but Not All That Modern
